channel.title: Results: improve consistency of result standard: aggregations-status
channel.description: This suggestion addresses Principle 7.1 from a consultation driven by Monitoring and Evaluation experts from UK CSOs Jan – Mar 2017 – (per http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/results-discussion-space-and-tag-2016-17-path/502/ ) - see attached document Results_aggregations-statusImproveConsistencyOfResultStandard.docx (13.6 KB)

item.title: Results: improve consistency of result standard: aggregations-status
item.dc:creator: mikesmith
item.description:
Including link to google doc version of proposal document per @Herman’s suggestion with indication of the minimum suggestions raised at the technical standards day of the IATI TAG 2017. Please use this google doc instead of the word document: Results: improve consistency of result standard: aggregation-status

Read full topic
item.source: Results: improve consistency of result standard: aggregations-status

item.title: Results: improve consistency of result standard: aggregations-status
item.dc:creator: Herman
item.description:
Yes, this is definitely an improvement. It is indicator values which can be aggregated or not. Not results.

Read full topic
